name: A Quick Question about a Druid/ Barbarian
author: Stagmeister

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I'm trying to pull together another RP build that should really have both Barb and Druid baked in, and one question that raised its head early in my thinking (particularly as this will be my first proper Druid build, and will likely annoy the hells out of Max in any case - just hopefully from my deliberate choices rather than by accident) is this:

Can I enter Rage while in animal form?

It's not a deal-breaker, but will help determine how barbaric I want to go.

Thanks in advance.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Yes.

You can enter Rage while in animal, elemental, and any other shapes or forms.

It is this property that is the "saving grace" for Risen Lords - for you can use Terrifying Rage to cause those turning Clerics to instead squeal in fear!

I love it!

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Druid/Barb is the only option to have a truly terrifying dragon too. You know, after you are bored from the same old kung-fu ones.
